input.content:
You are playing a text adventure game.

Objective: Welcome to another exciting session of TextWorld! First of all, venture south. That done, take a trip east. Then, doublecheck that the cuboid locker in the studio is shut. Got that? Good!

Use the execute_command tool to interact with the game world. You can move between rooms, pick up objects, examine things, and perform actions to complete your quest.

tools.name: execute_command
tools.description: Execute a text command in the game world. Use natural language commands like 'go north', 'take apple', 'open door', etc.

command.description: The text command to execute in the game

input.content:
You are playing a text adventure game.

Objective: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First thing I need you to do is to make absolutely sure that the safe in the bedchamber is unlocked. And then, ensure that the safe within the bedchamber is open. Then, recover the textbook from the safe inside the bedchamber. After taking the textbook, put the textbook on the bed stand. Got that? Good!

Use the execute_command tool to interact with the game world. You can move between rooms, pick up objects, examine things, and perform actions to complete your quest.

Objective: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an profound round of TextWorld? You do! Here is how to play! First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to go to the east. And then, recover the type X latchkey from the floor of the bedroom. After that, make absolutely sure that the type X box in the bedroom is unlocked. Once that's all handled, you can stop!

Use the execute_command tool to interact with the game world. You can move between rooms, pick up objects, examine things, and perform actions to complete your quest.

You are playing a text adventure game.

Objective: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an fast paced round of TextWorld? You do! Here is how to play! First of all, unlock the gate with the passkey. Then, make sure that the gate within the kitchenette is opened. And then, try to travel east. With that done, close the gate. Alright, thanks!

Use the execute_command tool to interact with the game world. You can move between rooms, pick up objects, examine things, and perform actions to complete your quest.
